name: .D3D File Extension
summary: Learn about .D3D files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: 3D model file used by GameMaker, an application used to develop 2D and 3D games; stores a model mesh, which can be texturized; used for loading game objects, such as buildings, monsters, and items.

content: GameMaker only supports 3D models in the Pro version.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
